timeline.bodyText:
Mockito is a bad practice which should be avoided as much as possible. You can
JdbcExecutionOptions jdbcExecutionOptions = JdbcExecutionOptions.builder()
			.withBatchIntervalMs(1000_000L)
			.withBatchSize(1)
			.withMaxRetries(1)
			.build();
ExecutionConfig executionConfig = new ExecutionConfig();
to create them.

replies.bodyText: I suggest to suse 1000s for the interval and 1 for the batch to quickly throw the exception and avoid a async exception.

replies.bodyText: If we want to use scheduler in batchingOutputFormat, we have to set the batchsize larger than 1.  So I think we setting batsize 2 is better.
